characters: Driver of a white van, driver of a black sedan, driver of a silver sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road with multiple lanes. The traffic is moderate, and the vehicle is maintaining a steady speed. The white van ahead is moving in the same lane, while the black sedan on the left and the silver sedan on the right are also maintaining their lanes. There are no sudden movements or dangerous behaviors observed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane. The vehicle is following the white van ahead at a safe distance, ensuring smooth traffic flow. The driver is cautious and attentive to the surrounding vehicles.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white van, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Left: A black sedan, approximately 8 meters away, maintaining its lane. 3) Right: A silver sedan, approximately 7 meters away, maintaining its lane.
